metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4191 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting versions 13.0 to14.6.5, 14.7 to 14.7.4, and 14.8 to 14.8.2. Private GitLab instances withrestricted sign-ups may be vulnerable to user enumeration tounauthenticated users through the GraphQL API.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
